locations: West Sussex, England, UK::(Amy and Ella's House)
imdb.plot outline: A thriller series about the dangers of the internet - and an age where everything is stored on your computer. Two girls unwittingly get on the wrong side of a dangerous hacker when attempting to torrent movies, and it is not long before they realize just how easy it is for the most personal information to get into the wrong hands
imdb.title: I.M.
plot: When teaching her housemate how to torrent free movies, Amy unwittingly opens the door to an unknown hacker, who's only motive is misery.::Leslie Cantano

A thriller series about the dangers of the internet - and an age where everything is stored on your computer. Two girls unwittingly get on the wrong side of a dangerous hacker when attempting to torrent movies, and it is not long before they realize just how easy it is for the most personal information to get into the wrong hands
